title: Family-Friendly Fiji Island Escape with All-Inclusive Dining & Roundtrip Transfers from Nadi
description:
Treat the whole family to an unforgettable slice of paradise with a luxe Fijian escape at Beachcomber Island Resort. Located in the crystal-clear South Pacific waters, in the heart of the Mamanuca Islands, this tropical sanctuary invites you to experience sun-kissed, barefoot splendour and seclusion, where colourful reefs brimming with striking marine life and powdery white sands beckon.

With its serene beachfront setting and myriad of facilities, including a restaurant, spa, mini-golf course, pool and PADI dive centre, this lush haven is the perfect launchpad for discovering the wonders of the region and an idyllic place to retreat to after days filled with island-hopping adventure.
offer_address: Beachcomber Island, Tai Island, Mamanucas, Fiji

title: Rustic Island Escape with All-Inclusive Meals
description: Discover an island paradise nestled in Fiji’s breathtaking Mamanuca Islands. Stay just metres from the crystalline waters of the idyllic South Pacific and reconnect with nature in raw island living. Unwind with a five or seven-night stay and enjoy daily buffet breakfast, daily buffet lunch and nightly themed dinners, return scheduled land and ferry transfers and a welcome bottle of wine on arrival.
offer_address: Beachcomber Island, Tai Island, Mamanucas, Fiji

title: Rustic Island Escape with All-Inclusive Meals
description: Discover an island paradise nestled in Fiji’s breathtaking Mamanuca Islands. offer_address: Beachcomber Island, Tai Island, Mamanucas, Fiji

title: Family-Friendly Fiji Island Escape with All-Inclusive Dining
description:
Wherever you go in Fiji, you can expect some of the warmest welcomes, bluer-than-blue crystal-clear waters and sugar-fine sands, but nowhere more so than at the coastal paradise of Beachcomber Island Resort in the iconic Mamanuca Islands. Spread your towel on a brochure-worthy patch of sand and find isolated bliss on this glorious stretch of tropical oceanfront where the waves of the South Pacific keep rolling in.

Enjoy the ultimate family escape with all-inclusive daily breakfast, buffet lunches and themed dinners, return transfers from Nadi, a complimentary bottle of wine on arrival and two 30-minute massages per adult.

**Travelling with family?** Up to two kids (aged 11 years and under) stay and eat free with up to two hours of babysitting included once during your stay.

⏱**Buy now, book later:** Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details).
offer_address: Beachcomber Island, Tai Island, Mamanucas, Fiji

title: Family-Friendly Fiji Island Escape with All-Inclusive Dining & Roundtrip Transfers from Nadi
description:
Treat the whole family to an unforgettable slice of paradise with a luxe Fijian escape at Beachcomber Island Resort. Located in the crystal-clear South Pacific waters, in the heart of the Mamanuca Islands, this tropical sanctuary invites you to experience sun-kissed, barefoot splendour and seclusion, where colourful reefs brimming with striking marine life and powdery white sands beckon.

With its serene beachfront setting and myriad of facilities, including a restaurant, spa, mini-golf course, pool and PADI dive centre, this lush haven is the perfect launchpad for discovering the wonders of the region and an idyllic place to retreat to after days filled with sun-kissed adventures.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Up to two children (12 and under) stay and eat free, with two hours of babysitting once per stay
- Experience true indulgence with all-inclusive daily dining (breakfast, morning and afternoon tea, lunch and dinner)
- Arrive in style with scheduled roundtrip land and ferry transfers from Nadi International Airport
- Bliss out with two relaxing, full-body 30-minute massages per adult at the resort's health spa
- Enjoy a welcome bottle of wine to start your stay with a bang

**Upgrade and longer stay bonuses:** Receive a bonus nightly glass of house beer, wine or soft drink plus an additional 30-minute full-body massage per adult with select packages.

**Book with 100% Confidence:** If for whatever reason you don’t want to go on your holiday, you can cancel right up to 14 days before check-in and get a 100% credit to use at Luxury Escapes for any other accommodation offer. Excludes flights, see the Fine Print for details.
offer_address: Beachcomber Island, Tai Island, Mamanucas, Fiji

title: Family-Friendly Fiji Island Escape with Onsite Restaurant, Bar & Day Spa

Wherever you go in Fiji, you can expect some of the warmest welcomes, bluer-than-blue crystal-clear waters and sugar-fine sands, but nowhere more so than at this coastal paradise in the iconic Mamanuca Islands. Spread your towel on a brochure-worthy patch of sand and find isolated bliss on this glorious stretch of tropical oceanfront.
